E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/28/1990
Subject: Oswaldo Jimenez learns new position
Oswaldo Jimenez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Billy Wallace
Dear Sir,
Billy Wallace isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .236, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of William Schwindt
Dear Sir,
William Schwindt has an AVG of .205 at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Joe Neilsen
Dear Sir,
Joe Neilsen shouldn't play at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!

be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/4/1990
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Allen Lent



Date: Saturday, 5/10/1990
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Jose Ramirez

Your scouting director

Date: Monday, 5/19/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
James Riner
